property.name: Attr1
property.value: You may evade Funeral Urn. If defeated, do not banish this card but place it next to the scenario card and you may immediately attempt to close this location. If undefeated, take 1 mental damage which may not be reduced.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If undefeated, succeed in a Constitution or Fortitude 6 check or become Infected. Whenever an Infected character discards a card, they must bury it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before the encounter, if there are any other cards at this location, succeed in a Perception 6 check or shuffle Chose of Apollyon back into the location deck. Any character damaged by Chosen of Apollyon becomes Infected. Whenever an Infected character discards a card, they must bury it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before the encounter you must succeed in a Perception 8 check or be dealt 1 Ranged combat damage and the difficulty to defeat Garrak is increased by 2.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before the encounter, each character at this location must succeed in a Wisdom 7 check or take 1 mental damage. All damage dealt by Hate is mental damage. Allies discarded as a result of damage from Hate are buried. If you do not defeat Hate using a Divine check, it counts as undefeated.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before the encounter, each character at this location must succeed in a Constitution or Fortitude 8 check, or take 1d4 Cold damage. The Lich is immune to the Mental, Poison and Cold traits. Subtract 1 from each die in your check to defeat the Lich.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Garrak is the leader of the largest criminal gang in Sandpoint, and they have been more active of late. Local businesses are being threatened and extorted, and citizens fear for their lives. When his men are arrested, they often vanish from prison before trial. Can you act quickly and put an end to Garrak's gang?

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Waterfront Prison The Rusty Dragon Town Square Glassworks General Store Village House Sandpoint Cathedral

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The difficulty to defeat a Bandit Henchman is increased by the number of closed locations. This does not apply to Bandits summoned during the game.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Each character gains a Basic boon of his choice.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Shunned for years by sailors, this small island is rumoured to contain a ruined temple with vaults filled with gold. Visitors to the island tell tales of ghosts and walking corpses, but little in the way of reward gained. Are you brave enough to challenge the Island of the Dead?

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Junk Beach Desecrated Vault Shrine to Lamashtu Treacherous Cave Woods Throne Room Thassilonian Dungeon Temple

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The difficulty of checks to acquire blessings is increased by 2.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Each character gains a random item, weapon from the box.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: A sudden outbreak of a virulent bleeding disease is sweeping the are around Sandpoint. Both animals and people are affected, and the disease does not seem to be natural in origin. So who, or what, is responsible?

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Woods Farmhouse Wooden Bridge Town Square Sandpoint Cathedral City Gate Academy Apothecary

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If you gain an ally, roll 1d6. On a 1, the ally is infected with bleeding disease, and you must succeed at a Fortitude 6 check or become Infected. Whenever an Infected character discards a card, they must bury it.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Chosen of Apollyon

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Infected Pool

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Each character gains a random Armour from the box.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: With Nualia defeated, Sandpoint should be safe from further attacks from Thistletop. But what unknown treasures and lost magics remain in the deep caverns beneath? There is only one way to find out...

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Deeper Dungeons Goblin Fortress Shrine to Lamashtu Desecrated Vault Treacherous Cave Warrens Throne Room Thassilonian Dungeon

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Lich cannot be defeated unless Funeral Urn has been defeated.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Funeral Urn Ancient Skeletons

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Each character gains two random Items.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: A gang of goblins have take to ambushing travellers along the Forest Road. The mayor has asked if you could see them off before their presence seriously affects the trade route to the town. The only problem may be that the goblins are accompanied by a couple of fierce ogres...

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Woods Nettlemaze Treacherous Cave Warrens Farmhouse Temple Wooden Bridge Guard Tower

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Subtract 1d4 from any check made to defeat Goblin Raider Henchmen or Gogmurt.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Goblin Raiders

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Each character gains a random weapon from the box.
